pages.text: $(#551012)Ensure your volume is on and loud enough. Audio is crucial for gameplay and knowing where enemies are. Headphones are highly recommended.$(br2)Certain important items are pre-bookmarked in JEI, visible on the left side of your inventory. You can bookmark items yourself by pressing $(#104455)A$(#551012).$()

$(#551012)Many items are meant to be used by pressing $(#104455)right-click$(#551012) with it in your hand. However, if you have a weapon/tool in your off-hand, you must $(#104455)shift + right-click$(#551012) to use it.$(br2)Check points occur before every major boss battle and after entering a new dimension. Your spawn point is set when you see this message: $(br)$(#104455)Your soul has been bound to this position.$()
$(#551012)You can move while in your inventory or any block GUI!$()
